IT Support Engineer Manager |

SUMMARY

Dynamic IT professional with six years experience in technical support, system administration, and IT project leadership. Proven track record in delivering first-line support, troubleshooting hardware/software and network issues, and managing IT infrastructures in diverse environments. Adept at coordinating remote installations, training end-users, and managing vendor relationships to ensure seamless operations. Based in Kigali with a strong commitment to excellence and proactive problem-solving.

EDUCATION

  • Master of Science in Information Technology, Carnegie Mellon University Africa – Kigali, Rwanda (2023 - 2025)
    Specializations: Cybersecurity
  • Bachelor of Science in Information Technology, University of Education, Winneba - Kumasi, Ghana (2015 - 2017)
    Specializations: Software Engineering

TECHNICAL SKILLS

  • IT Management: Network Admin (LAN/WAN, TCP/IP, DNS, VPN), Server Maintenance, AV Support
  • Cybersecurity: GRC, Data Protection, Backup & Recovery, IT Governance, Risk Management, ISO/IEC 27001:2022, NIST CSF
  • Tools/Technologies: RAG, LangChain, PHP, MySQL, Oracle, CodeIgniter, Apache, Bootstrap
  • Project Management: Agile, Cross-functional Collaboration
  • Soft Skills: Leadership, Communication, Data-driven Decisions
  • Platforms: Windows, macOS, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365 & Entra, Linux, AWS, Azure, Railway

CERTIFICATIONS

  • Certified in Cybersecurity (CC), International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC2) – Aug 2024
  • Governance, Risk, and Compliance Certification – Dec 2024
  • Data Science and Machine Learning: Making Data-Driven Decisions, MIT Institute for Data, Systems, and Society (IDSS) – Dec 2022
  • Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate – Ongoing
  • CompTIA Security+ – Ongoing

LEADERSHIP & ACHIEVEMENTS

  • Elected Association President, Association of Polytechnics Information Technology Students (APITS) – Demonstrated strong leadership and team collaboration.
  • Actively contributed to Microsoft Pathfinder's Help Desk initiative during the 40th Anniversary of Wa Senior High School, showcasing community engagement and IT support excellence.
  • Recognized on the Dean's List at Dr. Hilla Limann Technical University for academic excellence.
